content: <mlnfltv> I'm having some trouble joining perfnet2 with my Erigon node. What seems to be happening on my end is that I'm failing to connect to all 5 EL bootnodes due to handshake errors due to "too many peers" on the bootnode side. That then leads to issues with backward downloading blocks off of the shadow fork. Is anyone else seeing something similar? My theory so far is that because we use "networkid":1 the current 5 bootnodes get filled up with mainnet peers and reject new connections from new joiners of perfnet2.
